name: Geo Slime
description:
Small monsters created through the buildup of Geo within the earth.
Generally speaking, the crust of the earth is filled with Geo energy. Geo Slimes that are formed this way have a similarly "down-to-earth" sort of feeling.

investigation.name: Slime
investigation.description: A pudgy elemental life form.\nIt's said that desserts made from slimes of different elements will have incredibly distinctive flavors.
